Class PoleVaultingZombie

java.lang.Object
model.zombies.Zombie
model.zombies.PoleVaultingZombie
public class PoleVaultingZombie extends Zombie
Zombie that can leap over the first plant it encounters.

  • Constructor Details

    • PoleVaultingZombie

      public PoleVaultingZombie(Tile pos)
      Creates a pole vaulting zombie at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      pos - starting tile

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public void attack(Tile[][] board)
      Attacks the plant on the current tile if one exists. The Tile[][] board is never used here. It is only used by the PoleVaultingZombie for jump purposes during its first attack
      Overrides:
      attack in class Zombie

    • jump

      public boolean jump(Tile[][] board)
      Performs the jump over a plant if it has not jumped yet.
      Parameters:
      board - current game board
      Returns:
      true if the zombie already jumped

    • hasJumped

      public boolean hasJumped()
      Returns:
      whether this zombie has already performed its vaulting jump
